name: Roie Zivan
content: Roie Zivan @ BGU Roie Zivan - Industrial Engineering and Management - Ben Gurion University of the Negev Home Contact Research Publications I am an associate professor in the department of Indusrial Engineering and Management at Ben Gurion University of the Negev (BGU). My primary area of interest is in the field of Multi Agetn Systems including Distributed Constraint Reasoning and Multi-agent Optimization. I did both my graduate and under graduate studies at the Computer Sciense department at Ben-Gurion University of the Negev. My PhD thesis was titled Concurrent Search for Distributed Constraint Satisfaction problems and was advised by Prof. Amnon Meisels. After I completed my PhD I did a two years post-doc period at the Robotics institute in Carnegie Mellon University in which I was advised by Prof. Katia Sycara. Â© 2009 Website.com.
